title: Flooh's
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger restaurant making its own patties and sauces. Has a vegetarian burger (contains bell pepper, fennel, string beans, zucchini, onion, and mushroom) that you could ask to omit cheese and replace with guacamole or/and salsa instead and request vegan buns. Owner also makes a vegan mayonaise and daily soups with option for vegetable broth for vegan customers.
